posts.post_content: Ryan, very nice card. I think you should be able to get $30-32K (Net) IMO

Kevin, with all due respect, I am not interested in your assessment of the card's value and would appreciate if you kept your opinions to yourself on my thread and please delete your post, at least the part about $$. Thanks
I dont think so, thanks anyway...You dont have it listed for any specific price...

[quote name="CMIZ5290" post=1778787]Ryan, very nice card. I think you should be able to get $30-32K (Net) IMO[/QUOTE]

Infraction given.
Nothing personal but I think you are the first person to ever get 3 infractions and still be on the board. I know you didn't mean harm by this comment but it, and comments like it,  are expressly forbidden. Anything is expressly forbidden except a benign comment. And what you said was not a benign comment such as Nice Card or Good luck with the sale....thanks....
WOW, Kevin...you destroyed this thread in record time!  Like a Mike Tyson fight of the late 80's!

Leon, just to be clear. A guy lists a card on the BST with no intention of selling it, nor does he give a price, he indicates initially that he is fishing for an offer.....I offer a suggested price of what I think the market is, and that figure  is $10,000 higher than PSA SMR price for a PSA 6? Really?
yeah, like you've never listed a card without a price but instead asked for an offer. what a piece of work you are.

[quote name="RedsFan1941" post=1778827]yeah, like you've never listed a card without a price but instead asked for an offer. what a piece of work you are.[/QUOTE]

Now here come the idiots....right on cue....Right Ronnie??

[quote name="RedsFan1941" post=1778827]yeah, like you've never listed a card without a price but instead asked for an offer. what a piece of work you are.[/QUOTE]

When is the last time you fished for a price on BST, and someone friendly suggested  $10K over PSA price? Answer, never, you stupid idiot....You dont have a freaking clue...I have no idea what's up Hotchkiss's Ass, but I was being helpful I thought....PSA SMR price for a 6 is $22,000, and I still stand by what I thought the card will bring...How is that a violation?

Thank you Leon.

Kevin, your “offered price” was not inappropriate, but rather the fact that you offered a price in the first place. You have posted cards yourself without listing an asking price.  I would have taken offers and if I got one I liked, I would have sold the card.  Bottom line, it’s my thread; There is just no need to comment, even if you were trying to help. I think the rule is clear on BST that aside from a “nice card” or “pm sent” etc, comments regarding price, quality etc are just not appropriate.  It’s all cleared up now, water under bridge, move on.
you're right kevin. you're the smartest guy in the room.

[quote name="Rhotchkiss" post=1778830]Thank you Leon.

Kevin, your “offered price” was not inappropriate, but rather the fact that you offered a price in the first place. You have posted cards yourself without listing an asking price.  I would have taken offers and if I got one I liked, I would have sold the card.  Bottom line, it’s my thread; There is just no need to comment, even if you were trying to help. I think the rule is clear on BST that aside from a “nice card” or “pm sent” etc, comments regarding price, quality etc are just not appropriate.  It’s all cleared up now, water under bridge, move on.[/QUOTE]

No problem, you move on as well....I never offered a price, period. I gave an opinion as to the value of the card based on my experience. The odds of you getting an offer on this BST that you would have accepted is slim to none pal...Ohh, slim just went to take a dump...

[quote name="RedsFan1941" post=1778831]you're right kevin. you're the smartest guy in the room.[/QUOTE]

And I would love to measure your IQ in a thimble...

[quote name="CMIZ5290" post=1778836]And I would love to measure your IQ in a thimble...[/QUOTE]

zing!

[quote name="RedsFan1941" post=1778831]you're right kevin. you're the smartest guy in the room.[/QUOTE]

Anybody who worships a team who's best player was Ernie Lombardi, you got to wonder big time...Just saying, good night Ronnie!
